title: Average Home Price In Top 7 Indian Cities Reaches Rs 1.23 Crore, 23% Jump
selftext:
Average Home Price In Top 7 Indian Cities Reaches Rs 1.23 Crore, 23% Jump

https://www.ndtv.com/business-news/average-home-price-in-top-7-indian-cities-reaches-rs-1-23-crore-23-jump-7062014
comments: Ludicrous rates. Why do builders all cater to the luxurious segment? Where are all the normal houses?
In Mumbai, this is the budget segment. You would be lucky to get anything above 350 sq. ft. even in the outer suburbs.
